contentSummary.name: Graph100 Enrichment Common
contentSummary.description: Common enrichment referenced by multiple groups
contentSummary.rawContent:
metadata:
  id: graph100-enrich-common
  name: Graph100 Enrichment Common
  description: Common enrichment referenced by multiple groups
  version: 0.1.0
  type: enrichment
  author: apex.demo@company.com
  created-date: 2025-10-19

enrichment:
  id: enrich-common
  steps:
    - id: set-common
      description: set common field
      when: "true"
      action: set
      params:
        field: enrichedCommon
        value: "COMMON"

contentSummary.name: Graph100 Rules C
contentSummary.rawContent:

rules:

    message: "C1 ok"

  - id: c-rule-2

    condition: "true"
    message: "C2 ok"

  name: Graph100 Groups Common
  description: Common checks referenced by multiple groups
  version: 0.2.0
  type: rule-config
  author: apex.demo@company.com
  created-date: 2025-10-19

rule-configurations:
  - 35-rules-common.yaml

rule-groups:
  - id: common-checks
    name: Common Checks
    operator: AND
    stop-on-first-failure: false
    priority: 5

      - common-2
      - common-3

contentSummary.name: Graph100 Groups C
contentSummary.description: Rule groups C referencing rules C and common
contentSummary.rawContent:

  name: Graph100 Groups C
  description: Rule groups C referencing rules C and common
  version: 0.2.0
  type: rule-config
  author: apex.demo@company.com
  created-date: 2025-10-19

rule-configurations:
  - 32-rules-c.yaml
  - 25-groups-common.yaml

enrichment-refs:
  - 62-enrich-common.yaml

rule-groups:
  - id: c-basic
    name: C Basic Group
    operator: AND
    stop-on-first-failure: true
    priority: 15
    rule-ids:
      - c-rule-1
      - c-rule-2

contentSummary.name: Graph100 Scenario C
contentSummary.rawContent:
metadata:
  id: graph100-scenario-c
  name: Graph100 Scenario C
  description: Scenario C referencing groups C
  version: 0.2.0
  type: scenario
  author: apex.demo@company.com
  created-date: 2025-10-19

rule-configurations:
  - 22-groups-c.yaml

scenario:
  scenario-id: scenario-c
  description: Expanded scenario C

  classification-rule:
    condition: "#type == 'C'"
    description: Route type C

  processing-stages:
    - stage-name: validation
      description: Validate using groups C
      config-file: 22-groups-c.yaml
      execution-order: 1
      failure-policy: terminate

contentSummary.name: Graph-100 Scenario Registry (Seed)
contentSummary.rawContent:
metadata:
  id: graph100-registry
  name: Graph-100 Scenario Registry (Seed)
  description: Registry for graph-100 dataset (initial seed)
  version: 0.1.0
  type: scenario-registry
  author: apex.demo@company.com
  created-date: 2025-10-19

# File-based dependencies (expanded)
rule-configurations:
  - 10-scenario-a.yaml
  - 11-scenario-b.yaml
  - 12-scenario-c.yaml
  - 13-scenario-d.yaml

scenarios:
  - id: scenario-a
    name: Scenario A
    description: Seed scenario A referencing groups A
    config-file: 10-scenario-a.yaml
    business-domain: Demo
    owner: owners+a@company.com

  - id: scenario-b
    name: Scenario B
    description: Seed scenario B referencing groups B
    config-file: 11-scenario-b.yaml
    business-domain: Demo
    owner: owners+b@company.com

  - id: scenario-c
    name: Scenario C
    description: Expanded scenario C referencing groups C
    config-file: 12-scenario-c.yaml
    business-domain: Demo
    owner: owners+c@company.com

  - id: scenario-d
    name: Scenario D
    description: Expanded scenario D referencing groups D
    config-file: 13-scenario-d.yaml
    business-domain: Demo
    owner: owners+d@company.com
